005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.CollectionUtil;
009
010import java.util.LinkedList;
011import java.util.List;
012
013import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
014
015public abstract class AbstractKeyConstraintBuilder<
016    T extends AbstractKeyConstraintBuilder<T, R>,
017    R extends IKeyConstraint>
018    extends AbstractConfigurableMessageConstraintBuilder<T, R> {
019  @NonNull
020  private final List<IKeyField> keyFields = new LinkedList<>();
021
022  /**
023   * Add a key field to the list of key fields.
024   *
025   * @param keyField
026   *          the key field to add
027   * @return this builder
028   */
029  @NonNull
030  public T keyField(@NonNull IKeyField keyField) {
031    this.keyFields.add(keyField);
032    return getThis();
033  }
034
035  /**
036   * Get the list of key fields set on this builder.
037   *
038   * @return the list of key fields
039   */
040  @NonNull
041  protected List<IKeyField> getKeyFields() {
042    return keyFields;
043  }
044
045  @Override
046  protected void validate() {
047    super.validate();
048
049    CollectionUtil.requireNonEmpty(getKeyFields());
050  }
051}
